lyrics.text:
Ko e fu’u totongi lahi,
‘E ‘Eiki, na’a ke ‘atu;
‘E hao ‘o mo’ui ai
‘A e kakai kotoa pē.

Pea lelei ngofua ai,
‘A e Tamai anga’ofa;
Ki he kakai ‘oku tui,
Sīsū, ki he ‘Afiona.

’O kau ka toe tu’u hake,
‘Eiki mei he’eku mate;
Ke ma’u hoku potu lelei,
‘I he maama ‘i ‘olunga.

Ko koe pē, ‘Eiki Sīsū
Te u vikiviki ki ai;
Pea mo ho’o pekia,
‘I he’eku angahia.
